DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to assess the effect of BMS-823778 on reducing atherosclerotic plaque inflammation
DOC.brief_title: Proof of Concept Study of BMS-823778 to Assess the Effects on Atherosclerosis
DOC.criteria: Documented atherosclerotic cardiovascular disease or at high risk of cardiovascular event On stable statin dose Clinically stable at time of screening and randomization Women of child bearing potential Medical conditions that would impact the absorption of the study drug
